page.title: 06Health
page.content: Our hospital is 70 years old. It serves Port Talbot district. There are 49 trained nurses and 23 untrained nurses. There are 18 consultants (7 operate), 2 housedoctors, and 3 anaesthetists. There are 7 kitchen staff and 24 cleaning staff. In our local dentist there are 4 dentists in one practice. The dentist does fillings mostly. There are two old peoples homes. 39 local old people live at Morawelon. They go to the homes because they can no longer look after themselves. There are 5 surgeries in the Health Centre. Twelve doctors work there. They each see approximately 40 patients per day. There are 5 different clinics with nurses who give injections, take blood and do dressings.
